text:
Mountain View, CA Portland, OR

Hiring for: Ruby on Rails -> databases(posgres,mysql,mongodb), caching(redis,memcache), Big Data -> hadoop,hadoop streaming hbase, cassandra, scripting, machine learning, chef/puupet Front End -> html5, Javascript frameworks(backbone.js, jquery, ember.js, sencha, kendo ) twitter bootstrap, websocket,visualization(d3,js, rapahel.js, fusioncharts) mobile -> objective-C, rubymotion

Full-time on-site only. INTERN and H1B welcome.

Competitive Salary, benefits

senthil@railsfactory.com http://www.railsfactory.com
